message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000. I want to assure you that I have a great track record of selling high-quality products to satisfied customers. However, I understand that you're a savvy buyer and want to make an informed decision. I'll give you a special deal: if you buy this product, I'll give you a 100% money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the product, I'll refund your $10000 in full. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, but I'd like to wait and see what the product's quality is before making a decision.

If you buy this product, I'll throw in a premium support package, which includes dedicated assistance and priority updates.
